728:3: atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarvavajrakulān sarvasattvārthaṃ [sthitvā] yāvan sanniyojyāvaivartikabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpya,
728:7: atha bhagavān sarvatathāgataguhyavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ [sarvatathāgataguhyamabhāṣat|
728:8: yathā yathā hi vinayāḥ sarvasatvāḥ] svabhāvataḥ|
728:9: tathā tathā hi satvārthaṃ kuryādrāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ||
728:15: harastu sarvacintāni na sa pāpena lipyate||
728:21: sarvakarmāṇi kurvan vaṃ sa bahupuṇyamāpnute|| iti||
